title: She Has a Secret
overview: It tells the story of professional boxer Yuan Qiangwei. Due to the mysterious "death" of her sister, she found out based on clues that the cold-blooded boss An Xuethu was the number one suspect, so she made a plan to get close to him and start a flash marriage mode. After the marriage, she discovered that the murderer was someone else. As the truth slowly emerged, she gradually fell in love with An Xuehhu. However, she never expected that he had already had all this under his control. It turned out that he had been secretly in love with her for many years. , the two are falling in love and killing each other, eliminating their inner grudges, jointly finding out the truth, and coming together.
